abstract: “Power Toilet,” an art project that claims to be an exact replica of the executive bathroom at JPMorgan Chase’s New York headquarters, has been installed at the Greek-owned Olympic Restaurant on Delancey Street.
snippet: “Power Toilet,” an art project that claims to be an exact replica of the executive bathroom at JPMorgan Chase’s New York headquarters, has been installed at the Greek-owned Olympic Restaurant on Delancey Street.
lead_paragraph: A commode fit for a Wall Street C-suite has made its way to the unlikeliest of places: a greasy-spoon diner on Manhattan’s Lower East Side.

headline.main: Dimon’s Bathroom Gets a Diner Double
